thread.title: Gillian Cumpstone
thread.title_full: Sunglasses Shop reviewed by Gillian Cumpstone

author: Gillian Cumpstone
title: Gillian Cumpstone
text: After purchasing Ray Ban sunglasses at my local opticians for a number of years my daughter suggested I try Sunglasses Shop. I found the website easy to use and the choice of glasses excellent. My chosen glasses were much cheaper than the same ones locally and arrived very quickly. I will definitely use them again.
